title: The low priority queue isnt even low priority
body:
Its not even a queue, its a 10 minute wait time to requeue, like when you leave at champ select.  What even is the point in making said queue if you just waste 50 minutes of your life waiting, I don't understand.

If your going to make a lpq, atleast make it properly.

replies.body: It is actually a low priority queue, you just have to wait a particular amount of minutes prior to queuing as well. My friend recently got low priority when we were playing matches together and I can tell you the people you meet in low priority are generally asses (understatement of the decade), in greater numbers too, when compared to most every other 'normal priority' queue.
I got it from the LoL recorder Bug/Glitch so yeah that sucked :(

It's the whole point of it.

And it gets longer if you AFK again, the more you AFK the longer it gets then it hits you with a ban and eventually permaban.
